name: Moof
description:
"As humanity's last hope, you have been given the task of defending the moon's surface against an onslaught of extraterrestrial slugs brought along by a seemingly unending barrage of meteorites. How long can you survive? Only you can stop them."

Moof is a top-down survival shooter, where you control a dwarf in his trusty space rover and destroy slugs with your blaster. 

Harvest minerals from the slugs to construct different turrets and reinforce them to provide you aid in this challenging endeavor. 

Made in 48 hours as part of a spontaneous game jam among friends.  We tried to combine the classic shoot-em-up gameplay with light tower-defense elements as proof of concept. This is our very first release so we appreciate any feedback :)

Controls:

  • WASD - Move your character
  • Cursor - Aim your blaster
  • Number keys - Place the corresponding turret at your current position
